A

AboutCommand - Class in com.karusmc.xmc.commands
Default implementation of an about command.

C

canUse(XMCommand, CommandSender) - Static method in class com.karusmc.xmc.util.Validator
Checks whether the CommandSender instance is an instance of ConsoleCommandSender, if console is allowed to use the command and lastly if the CommandSender instance has permission to use the command.
canUseInWorld(ConfigurableCommand, CommandSender) - Static method in class com.karusmc.xmc.util.Validator
Checks whether the CommandSender instance is an instance of ConsoleCOmmandSender, if the command has a per-world whitelist or blacklist and lastly if the list contains the world the sender is in.
clearCommands() - Method in class com.karusmc.xmc.core.CommandMapProxy
Notifies all registered CommandMapObserver instances and delegates to the underlying CommandMap implementation.
ClosableXMLEventReader - Class in com.karusmc.xmc.xml
A wrapper class for XMLEventReader that implements the AutoClosable interface to allow for a XMLEventReader instance to be used in try-with resource statements.
ClosableXMLEventReader(XMLEventReader) - Constructor for class com.karusmc.xmc.xml.ClosableXMLEventReader
Class constructor specifying the underlying XMLEventReader instance.
close() - Method in class com.karusmc.xmc.xml.ClosableXMLEventReader
com.karusmc.xmc.commands - package com.karusmc.xmc.commands
Provides out-of-the-box commands commonly used by plug-ins.
com.karusmc.xmc.core - package com.karusmc.xmc.core
Provides essential classes built upon Spigot's command handling system that all other packages and classes in this toolkit depend on.
com.karusmc.xmc.util - package com.karusmc.xmc.util
Provides utility classes that contains helpful static methods used by commands.
com.karusmc.xmc.xml - package com.karusmc.xmc.xml
Provides classes that handles parsing XML files.
com.karusmc.xmc.xml.nodes - package com.karusmc.xmc.xml.nodes
Provides classes that represent XML nodes used in the the Parser class in the parent package.
com.karusmc.xmc.xml.tags - package com.karusmc.xmc.xml.tags
Provides classes that represent XML tags used in the the Parser class in the parent package and the nodes in the XML nodes package.
CommandManager - Class in com.karusmc.xmc.core
This class acts as a facade and abstracts the internals of the toolkit.
CommandManager(Plugin) - Constructor for class com.karusmc.xmc.core.CommandManager
Class constructor specifying the owning plug-in.
CommandManager(Plugin, CommandMapProxy) - Constructor for class com.karusmc.xmc.core.CommandManager
Class constructor specifying the owning plug-in the CommandMapProxy instance.
CommandMapObserver - Interface in com.karusmc.xmc.core
Observer used by the default CommandMapProxy implementation.
CommandMapProxy - Class in com.karusmc.xmc.core
Acts as a proxy for the Spigot Server instance's internal CommandMap implementation.
CommandMapProxy(Server) - Constructor for class com.karusmc.xmc.core.CommandMapProxy
Class constructor specifying the Server instance to obtain the underlying CommandMap implementation from.

Utility class that provides general-purpose convenience methods.

E

Else - Interface in com.karusmc.xmc.util
Functional interface which implementations are used by the Validator class to handle invalid cases.
execute(CommandSender, String[]) - Method in class com.karusmc.xmc.commands.AboutCommand
Checks if the sender has the appropriate permissions and the number arguments is zero, before sending the plug-in's meta information if so.
execute(CommandSender, String[]) - Method in class com.karusmc.xmc.commands.DispatchCommand
Checks if the number of arguments is greater than or equal to 1 and there is a command instance registered with the name specified by the first argument, before trimming the arguments and delegating command execution to the command instance.
execute(CommandSender, String[]) - Method in class com.karusmc.xmc.commands.HelpCommand
Checks if the sender has the appropriate permissions and the number of arguments is between zero and two, before getting the search criteria and the page number and displaying the commands.
execute(CommandSender, String, String[]) - Method in class com.karusmc.xmc.core.XMCommand

execute(CommandSender, String[]) - Method in class com.karusmc.xmc.core.XMCommand
Abstract method that implementations should override
execute(CommandSender, String[]) - Method in class com.karusmc.xmc.xml.ParserRegister
Should never be called.

parse(XMLEventReader, XMCommand) - Method in class com.karusmc.xmc.xml.nodes.CommandsNode

Checks if each encountered XMLEvent is a StartElement before checking if there are any registered nodes with the StartElement's name, lastly, checking if there are any registered tags with the StartElement's name.
parse(XMLEventReader, XMCommand) - Method in interface com.karusmc.xmc.xml.nodes.Node
Implementations should loop through using the specified XMLEventReader instance and handle each XMLEvent instance.
parse(File) - Method in class com.karusmc.xmc.xml.Parser

parse(StartElement, XMCommand) - Method in class com.karusmc.xmc.xml.tags.CooldownTag
Gets the cool-down time from the StartElement instance specified and sets the cool-down time of the command accordingly if the value is greater than or equal to zero.
parse(StartElement, XMCommand) - Method in class com.karusmc.xmc.xml.tags.MetaTag
Gets the aliases, description and usage from the StartElement instance specified and sets the respective fields of the command instance.
parse(StartElement, XMCommand) - Method in class com.karusmc.xmc.xml.tags.PermissionTag
Gets the permission, permission message and if console is allowed and sets the respective fields of the command instance.
parse(StartElement, XMCommand) - Method in interface com.karusmc.xmc.xml.tags.Tag
Implementations should parse the specified StartElement and XML attributes and set the respective fields on the XMCommand instance using values derived from the XML attributes.
parse(StartElement, XMCommand) - Method in class com.karusmc.xmc.xml.tags.WorldsTag
Gets a blacklist or whitelist and and the worlds affected by it.

tabComplete(CommandSender, String, String[]) - Method in class com.karusmc.xmc.commands.DispatchCommand
Returns a list of possible subcommand names if the number of arguments is zero, delegates tabCompletion to a subcommand if a command with the name specified by the first argument is registered and the number of arguments is equal to or more than two, or returns null if none of the above conditions are met.
